org.tsugi.base

Class BaseSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tsugi.base.BaseSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Settings
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Settings_JDBC

    public class BaseSettings
extends Object
implements Settings
    The base implementation for the Settings interface

      • getLaunch

        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Get the launch associated with this object
        Specified by:
        getLaunch in interface Settings

      • persistSettings

        public boolean persistSettings()
        Persist the settings wherever they need to go. We expect the extending class to override this. If this is not overridden, settings will be in-memory only.

      • getSettingsJson

        public String getSettingsJson()
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Retrieve an JSON string of all of the settings
        Specified by:
        getSettingsJson in interface Settings

      • setSettingsJson

        public boolean setSettingsJson(String json)
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Set all of the settings from a JSON string
        Specified by:
        setSettingsJson in interface Settings
        Parameters:
        json - Properties that are serialized in JSON and stored. Replaces existing settings. Persists the new settings if they can be persisted.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getSettings

        public Properties getSettings()
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Retrieve an array of all of the settings If there are no settings, return an empty array.
        Specified by:
        getSettings in interface Settings

      • setSettings

        public boolean setSettings(Properties props)
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Set all of the settings.
        Specified by:
        setSettings in interface Settings
        Parameters:
        props - Properties that are serialized in JSON and stored. Replaces existing settings. If this is an empty array, this effectively empties out all the settings.Persists the new settings if they can be persisted.

      • updateSettings

        public boolean updateSettings(Properties props)
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Set or update a number of keys to new values in link settings.
        Specified by:
        updateSettings in interface Settings
        Parameters:
        props - An array of key value pairs that are to be updated / added in the settings.

      • getSetting

        public String getSetting(String key,
                         String def)
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Retrieve a particular key from the link settings. Returns the value found in settings or false if the key was not found. Persists the new settings if they can be persisted.
        Specified by:
        getSetting in interface Settings
        Parameters:
        key - - The key to get from the settings.
        def - - What to return if the key is not present

      • setSetting

        public boolean setSetting(String key,
                          String value)
        Description copied from interface: Settings
        Set or update a key to a new value in link settings. Persists the new settings if they can be persisted.
        Specified by:
        setSetting in interface Settings
        Parameters:
        key - The key to set in settings.
        value - The value to set for that key
